bibl.title: The Archive of Aurelius Isidorus in the Egyptian Museum, Cairo, and the University of Michigan (P. Cair. Isidor.).
bibl.seg: Boak Arthur E.R. and Herbert Chayyim Youtie (edited by), The Archive of Aurelius Isidorus in the Egyptian Museum, Cairo, and the University of Michigan (P. Cair. Isidor.).
Ann Arbor, The University of Michigan Press, 1960, 4°, xix-478 pp. et VII pll.

C.R. par B.R. Rees, JRS 50 (1960) pp. 282-283. - A. C[alderini], Aegyptus 39 (1959) pp. 391-393. - E. Seidl, Iura 13 (1962) pp. 320-323. - Cl. Préaux, ChrEg 38 (1963) No. 75, pp. 168-182. - Al. E. Samuel, CP 58 (1963) pp. 59-60. - N. Lewis, AJP 83 (1962) pp. 98-100. - H.I. Bell, JEA 47 (1961) pp. 171-173. - J. Schwartz, RPhil 3e s., 35 (1961) pp. 322-323. - H.J. Wolff, ZSav 78 (1961) pp. 440-446. - Éd. des Places, Orientalia N.S., 29 (1960) p. 456. - E.G. Turner, CR N.S., 11 (1961) pp. 152-153.
